name: Love Engine
summary: Love Engine is a game, which on the basis on a Chinese traditional festival called Magpie Festival. To make this game have something new compared to the tradition one, our technical team had came up with an idea that composing a beautiful story happen between a man and a woman. In this story, players will be attracted by its pure and fresh scenery. In addition, players can enjoy themselves with the elegant piano music. What's more, as players work out each custom pass, a touching love story is showed on the screen. There are many links in the game for you to enjoy such as the role-play, the music appreciation and the player-to player.
